(Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 11 December 2024, for next 24 hours)
Sea areas around the Island
The low-pressure area over the southwest Bay of Bengal is very likely to continue to move west-
northwestwards towards the Tamil Nadu coast close to Northern Sri Lanka during the next 24
hours. Naval and fishing communities are warned not to venture to the deep and shallow sea
areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Mullaitivu via Kankasanthurai and Mannar today
(December 11).
